attributes.action: grant the people of England our own parliament. The freedom to make decsions for ourselves without undue influence from Scotland or Wales or the need for divisive meaningless regional assemblies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people of England demand a voice and freedom from minority rule. Scottish students pay no tuition fees. Prescriptions in Wales cost half the price they do in England. Why can the Scots and the Welsh choose these things for themselves whilst Scots and Welsh MPs at Westminster STOP them happening in England?
England is the greatest of the UK nations yet the one in which democracy has been stiffled as surely as our taxes head North and West.
We didnt ask to break up the union - so why should we pay for it.
England is a great and proud nation, We want to be treated as such. Forget pointless and spurious regional assemblies  these would only divide our nation. I am English not a "East Midlander" or "West Midlander" (I live 100 yards from the hedge which borders Derbyshire and Staffordshire!!).
A parliament for England. Only those frightened of democracy oppose it!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
